title: GT 4.0 C WS Core : Developer's Guide

section.title: Introduction
section.para: The C WS-Core developer's guide provides information related to writing and running web services and WSRF-enabled services in C. It includes tutorials walking the developer through creation of services, and clients to interact with services. It includes scenarios for possible configurations that the developer may want. It also provides references to APIs and their documentation.

itemizedlist.listitem: Mapping WSDL to C Bindings - describes how to use the C bindings generated from WSDL and XML schema.

section.title: Public interface
section.para: The semantics and syntax of the APIs and WSDL for the component, along with descriptions of domain-specific structured interface data, can be found in the public interface guide.
